directions: Place the chicken breasts in a slow cooker. Stir together the tomatoes, garlic, soy sauce, and dry mustard; pour over the chicken breasts.
Cook on Low 7 hours; stir in peas and cook 1 hour more.
ingredients: 5 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 (16 ounce) can diced tomatoes with basil
title: Slow Cooker Tomato Chicken
